pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Level Interface for Survival Analysis and Associated Plots // A high-level interface to perform survival analysis, including Kaplan-Meier analysis and log-rank tests and Cox regression. Aims at providing a clear and elegant syntax, support for use in a pipeline, structured output and plotting. Builds upon the survminer package for Kaplan-Meier plots and provides a customizable implementation for forest plots.
